channel.title: Wentao Ding 丁文涛
channel.description: Recent content on Wentao Ding 丁文涛

item.title: Projection onto Stiefel manifold
item.description: In this post, we will give some explicit formulas of the projection of a matrix \( Y \in \mathbb{R}^{n \times p} \) onto Stiefel manifold \( \St(p, n) \).

item.title: Equivalent first order optimality conditions over Stiefel manifold
item.description: This post is a short summary of equivalent first order optimality conditions collected from several papers for the smooth optimization problem over Stiefel manifold.

item.title: Ignore certain files in ivy
item.description: latex and latexmk generate some auxiliary files while compiling, which will be edited rarely.

item.title: Write blog with Hugo and Emacs
item.description: This is my note for writing blogs with Hugo and Emacs.
